title: Process an Expense Against a Matter
description: An attorney incurred an expense (e.g., a filing fee) and needs to have it recorded against the correct client matter for billing.

tasks.description: Receive the expense details (amount, date, description) and the client/matter code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all the necessary information.

tasks.description: Enter the expense into the billing system, associating it with the correct matter.
Attach a copy of the receipt to the expense entry for auditing purposes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The expense is fully documented in the system.
